items.title: The legend of Zelda
items.description: The Legend of Zelda is a high fantasy action-adventure video game franchise created by Japanese game designers.

items.title: Tomb Raider
items.description: Development of Tomb Raider, the first video game, began in 1994; it was released in October 1996.

items.title: Dark Souls 3
items.description: Dark Souls III is an action role-playing video game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
